credit_counseling.description: Nonprofit credit counseling, debt management plans, and financial education

credit_counseling.name: Financial Counseling Association of America (FCAA)
credit_counseling.description: Nonprofit financial counseling and debt management

emergency_assistance.name: 211 Helpline
emergency_assistance.description: Find local help with rent, food, utilities, and other essential needs

emergency_assistance.name: Modest Needs
emergency_assistance.description: Short-term financial grants for people facing temporary financial crisis
emergency_assistance.note: Must be working but still struggling

emergency_assistance.name: Benefits.gov
emergency_assistance.description: Find government assistance programs you may qualify for

food_assistance.name: Feeding America
food_assistance.description: Locate food banks and pantries near you

food_assistance.name: SNAP (Food Stamps)
food_assistance.apply: Contact local SNAP office or apply online

debt_management.name: National Debt Relief
debt_management.description: Negotiate with creditors to reduce debt amounts
debt_management.note: Only for those seriously behind on payments

debt_management.name: InCharge Debt Solutions
debt_management.description: Debt management plans and credit counseling

employment_resources.name: CareerOneStop
employment_resources.description: Job search tools, career resources, and training programs sponsored by US Dept of Labor

employment_resources.name: Goodwill Job Connection
employment_resources.description: Free job training and placement services

employment_resources.name: SkillUp Coalition
employment_resources.description: Free online courses for career skills

housing_assistance.name: HUD Housing Counseling
housing_assistance.description: Find HUD-approved housing counselor for foreclosure prevention, rental help

housing_assistance.name: Salvation Army Rental Assistance
housing_assistance.description: Emergency financial assistance for rent and utilities

utility_assistance.name: LIHEAP (Low Income Home Energy Assistance)
utility_assistance.description: Help paying heating and cooling bills

utility_assistance.name: Dollar Energy Fund
utility_assistance.description: Grants to help pay utility bills

financial_education.name: Khan Academy Personal Finance
financial_education.description: Free courses on personal finance topics

bankruptcy_resources.name: Legal Aid Bankruptcy Help
bankruptcy_resources.description: Free or low-cost legal help for bankruptcy

bankruptcy_resources.name: Upsolve
bankruptcy_resources.description: Free tool to file Chapter 7 bankruptcy without a lawyer
bankruptcy_resources.note: For those with simple cases and income under certain thresholds

financial_therapy.name: Financial Therapy Association
financial_therapy.description: Find therapists who specialize in financial stress and money issues
